reviews.review:
Antes de empezar quiero recalcar que llevo alrededor de las 180h jugadas, no me hace un experto pero si que he jugado lo suficiente como para dar mi opinión en este análisis.

Juego muy entretenido y viciante. Muy barato para la cantidad de horas que se le pueden echar. El problema: los DLCs. Es mucho contenido que no se nos da con el juego al comprarlo. Además, los DLCs te dan muchas ventajas sobre los que no se compran ese contenido extra, pero no convierte el juego en un P2W. Jugar solo es entretenido pero lo que aporta un gran entretenimiento a las partidas es jugar con amigos mientras os comunicáis por algún canal de audio (skype, discord, ts...). Otro aspecto negativo del juego es que parece que los devs hacen poco caso a la comunidad porque hay cosas que no cambian que llevamos un tiempo quejándonos, pero ya han puesto un "test server" así que parece que poco a poco escuchan nuestras plegarias. 

Nada más que añadir, un juego barato para lo que nos tienen acostumbrados otras compañías con horas y horas de diversión si te gastas algún eurillo más.

PD: Quiero aclrar que los DLCs no son para nada caros, la gran mayoría no tendremos problemas en adquirirlos si de verdad nos gusta el juego y queremos apoyar a la compañía.

Отлично мусорное комьюнити у игры! Играешь за мана - 3 из 4 сурвов ливнули как только они легли. Играешь за сурва - мансишь всю катку от ТУНЕЛЛЕРА, крутишь 360, разводишь на хит под окнами, в какой-то момент начинаешь уставать, с горечью на последнем заведеном генераторе ложусь и ман начинает ФЕЙСКЕМПИТЬ..
ok

Even with the glitches and bugs this is actually a really fun game if you are interested in the genre. All the reviews about the devs not caring are false, people need to understand that it's very difficult to release regular updates without causing glitches( Hence the people saying it has too many bugs even as the dev team is actively fixing them). If you go find their twitch they do weekly streams and constantly communicate with the comuntity. I'm not saying they don't mess up, but they do listen and try to fix things. 

Although, if glitches and a fairly toxic community would ruin this game for you, then I might not suggest getting DBD right now. I ( Someone who's been playing on and off since beta), for what it's worth still love this game despite the flaws.

I've been playing this game through the initial Survive with Friends not working (this got really annoying that I stopped playing for a little bit), patches to fix bugs, and DLC's. 

I've gotta say - I'm still really enjoying this game. I like to play as a Survivor, however, I do play as the killer too to mix things up and to do all my daily rituals. Yes, there are still some bugs, but the devs have been releasing patch after patch to fix issues. To me, it shows they're listening to their customers.

I've also played with some awesome teams and some really good killers, so they also make the game enjoyable for me, even though I may throw some salt to face campers if I'm hooked first lol. I also still play SWF with a friend or two, so it's at least better than it was back in July!

原来的测评完全是为了一个成就，就像淘宝购物满意后随手打的好评，现在删了，重新写写
============================================================================
雷电法王据说要登录了，想想也搞笑，不过也挺可怜，好好的一个人，硬把自己变成了一个现实中的鬼，有时候或许很难理解，也确实想不通，至于背后，看到一点却又没人能深究，只能探讨本质。
============================================================================
歪了，抛开这些不谈，一开始投票的时候，抱着笑话的心态，真的没想到杨永信真的能选上，又扯到别的了，好了，不谈杨永信了。因为这个活动，能看出对国内玩家的重视，所以说，很感谢。[spoiler]有人可能对这个感谢有说辞，或许游戏开发商是为了赚钱，但他至少重视我们这个市场，尊重是相互的，他对我们足够尊重，也值得我说一声感谢[/spoiler]
[h1]我其实不太会玩这类游戏[/h1]，但还是非常喜欢这个游戏的，这是一款好游戏，虽然说人气流失，玩家流失是事实，但这也是难以避免的。当下主播纷纷转战跳伞[spoiler]貌似是因为国家政策禁止？我不太清楚[/spoiler]，人气下滑也是很自然的，尤其这个游戏当初也是因为主播推广而开始火爆。不过，我想，新dlc的加入，大概会吸引不少人气。
别的也没啥好说的，[strike]我玩的少，技术又菜，还能说啥[/strike]，[h1]祝游戏越做越好吧！[/h1]

Really good game most people that play this i guarantee will like it.

Update

Nach den letzten paar Patches die in kurzem Abstand released wurden, hat sich das Matchmaking deutlich verbessert. Es kommt nur noch selten zum Rausschmiss aus der Lobby und auch das Finden eines Spiels geht deutlich schneller und zuverlässiger. Außerdem funktioniert das Teamwork unter den Spieler plötzlich besser, obs an der Vorweihnachtszeit liegt? :)

Review

Wenn das Spiel läuft und man nicht gerade gefühlt stundenlang in der Lobby hängt, dann kann das gemeinsame Reparieren von Generatoren und Flüchten vorm blutrünstigen Killer sehr viel Spaß machen. 

Man merkt, dass die Entwickler bemüht sind, ihr Spiel zu stabilisieren und die (doch noch zahlreich) vorhandenen Bugs auszumerzen. Bis jetzt gab es einen kostenlosen und einen Bezahl-DLC zum kleinen Preis, was ich bisher eine ganz gute Politik finde, um eben auch die Entwickler bei ihrer Arbeit zu unterstüzten.

Das Spiel selbst bietet keine weltbewegenden Mechaniken und im Prinzip macht man jede Sitzung das Gleiche, aber verschiedene Perks und Items von Jäger und Gejagten verleihen jeder Sitzung eine gewisse Einzigartigkeit. Mal hängt man nach fünf Minuten blutend am Haken, mal schafft man es als Gruppe gemeinsam gerade so zu flüchten. Die Spannung und Atmosphäre ist einfach top, das macht richtig viel Spaß.

Da sehe ich dann schon auch mal drüber hinweg, dass die Perfomance teilweise sehr zu wünschen übrig lässt, das Matchmaking bzw. das Finden einer Lobby immer noch sehr viel Luft nach oben hat und einige Glitches und Bugs teils zum unfairen Ableben führen. 

Insgesamt Daumen nach oben, die Entwickler arbeiten fleißig daran und wenn man bisschen Zeit mitbringt, kann man viel Spaß haben (auch, wenn man ständig stirbt - erstaunlicher Weise)

In dieser Gruppe https://steamcommunity.com/groups/hoi4deu findest du mehr gute Reviews von mir, dort könnt ihr mir auch folgen.

If you want the fear that comes with running/hiding for your vitual life from a living, breathing, blood hungry muderer, you have found the right game.  If you seek the thrill of hunting down your weak, coweredly prey, then by all means join in on the hunt.  This is by far the best multyplayer game ever.
lastima que con cada actualizacion cagen mas el juego, aun asi es un juegazo

I am playing Dead by Daylight now for around 900 hours.
The game is an up and down all the time.

If you have a thick Skin and can handle rude toxic and rage. You’re good with this game.
Dead by Daylight is a competitive Game, so there is really, much salt and toxic in the community.

Now let’s go to the Game itself.
The Developer spends much time into the game to bring it forward. They are all the time trying to balance the game. Well in the end it`s not really working, one side is all the time complaining they are weak and the opponent side is to strong. That’s true on one side, but they do rebalance things and so it changes on some point and then change back. 
Dead by Daylight is a 1v4 Multiplayer game.
That mean`s there are 4 survivors playing against 1 killer. The target of the killer is killing them all and the survivors have to do 5 gens and open the exit gates. They most common key for survivors is to play in a team, sadly many don`t do that, so there are a bunch of PERKS you have to have. (Self-care is a must have). It is frustrating sometimes if the full team dies because of no team play. But well just join the next lobby and try again ;)
Killers are Alone on their journey to kill the survivors, in low rank killers are really overpowered and you will die lots of times, but it doesn`t mean anything, you get blood points to get better perks and stuff. In high Rank, well then Killers are really hard to win against skilled pallet loopers and peeps using 369S and met builds. But in the end if you don`t care about a full 4 man kill round or every single game an escape it`s really funny.
I would all of you suggest just ignore the after chat, when the hate and insulting rage starts…. Well since it is a competitive game, peoples get mad pretty fast.

Well and there is one thing you will face in the game pretty often, Camp Killers, they park their avatar right in front of your face, makes it impossible to unhook and rescue you from the hook. In that case the one on the hook is well fkd up.

Pros of the game:
+ really good game concept
+ every single game has his own flair and thrill
+ Graphics are really amazing
+ very cool atmosphere 
+ Perk system (teachable perks you can use later on other characters)
+ Offerings to give each game a own flavor
+ Dev`s are really into releasing new content and fix bugs

Contras of the Game:
- Sometimes long lobby waiting times 
- balancing (low Rank killers to overpowered high ranks the other way)
- if you face a skilled Nurse, your 90% of the time Dead
- Matchmaking is terrible since the release of the game 
- The Killer ALWAYS host the game it’s an P2P game, so if you are into an killer with potato internet or you face a Region hopper, your game will LAG so much, sometimes it’s impossible to play.
- No implemented Ping indicator, to see if the others lag or not
- you need to use a 3rd party tool called MLGA (Make Lobby’s Great Again)

Awesome Game with the potential to get addicted !

Nice but not enough developped.

NEW REVIEW: 01.10.16
Ok, so this is the first time since I started playing that I'm actually rating it positive, matchmaking is very stable now.

But there are still a couple things that get on my nerve, that really need to be adressed:

1- Trapper hook behavior
Seriously, the Trapper is broken for one sole reason, placing traps right bellow hooked survivors, that is a very low blow since you're gonna end up hooked if you try saving someone.
Because if you're releasing someone while a Trap is right below you, either you get trapped in it, or the one getting freed from the hook gets trapped, which is very frustrating since the moment you enter the struggle phase you die Instantly by being placed on the hook again.
There should SERIOUSLY be a range where Trappers CAN'T place traps around hooked survivors, it can be a VERY SMALL range where all it does is preventing people getting trapped by getting either free or releasing someone, where it actually requires skill for the survivor to dodge those traps, instead of hoping that the Trapper is not face-camping or zone-camping the sorry b*stard that got hooked.
This gets more and more frustrating because higher ranked players ONLY play Trapper, and every single one of them does this.

2- Killer Lobby Dodging
It really is frustrating how many killers have started doing this lately, they keep dodging lobbies and there is nothing stopping them because the cooldown penalty is so ridiculously low.
Please, just boot them for 30m out of the matchmaking, and increase this penalty by 10m for every single time he does it in a row.
Either that or don't let the killer see the survivors at all in the lobby, just plain text showing that they joined or how many are left to create a game, because I noticed that they lobby dodge the moment they see people with certain Prestige Level, Items or even when they enter the same time thinking they're premade.

3- Hosting Logic
As far as researching about this matter goes, it seems like that the killer is the host, and oh boy has this been used for a lot of exploits, specially if you're facing a Hillibilly.
Basically, the killer sees you and boots up his torrents or whatever the hell he uses to make it for you, the surivor that joined being laggy.
And since he's the host, he isn't lagging at all, he just sees you flailing against walls or not walking at all, just being an easy target.
Lately this has happened A LOT, and reporting those lag switching Killers does not seem to do anything at all.

Aside from those 3 flaws I listed the game is pretty solid and I'm having a blast with it.
HOWEVER, if this goes on, this review quickly becomes Negative again, because those 3 flaws are VERY annoying.




OLD REVIEW: 24.09.16
So, they fixed most of the issues I adressed on the two previous reviews I made, but now we got a really big problem...
They promised an Update where we didn't have to press the Ready button over and over again, and guess what, those madmens actually delivered...in a bad way.

Now it boots you to the main menu constantly, true, you don't have to click the Ready Button anymore, but now you gotta join the search screen, invite your friends in case you want to create a party, and then click Ready, just to be booted to the main menu again.
Pretty amazing huh?

I have fun with the game but this is very frustrating, and I will still not recommend this game to anyone for those big big big issues in the lobby search that has plagued the game for MONTHS.

At the moment I have 70+ hours logged in this game at the moment, 40 of those are for waiting finding a game, I wasted almost two days worth of time for finding a game, how ridiculous is that?

AVOID AT ALL COSTS




OLD REVIEW: 27.07.16
They added a decent party system now, you can now queue with your friends, at the beginning it was terribly broken and you couldn't find a single game without having to re-queue with them for over 20m, but now it fails to find a game 2 out of 3 times in 5 minutes which is bearable.
I got a problem with the queueing though, whenever it fails to join a match, everyone has to click READY again for it to search again, which is irritating if you want to do something else while it's looking for a game, I hope they make a hotfix about this soon.

Now lets talk about the gameplay, like I said in my last review, it's fun, it really is, except if you run into Killers that are ???????s, as in, camping in front of the survivors that they hooked.
This is a terrible strategy because the Killer won't have enough points to prevent a lose anyways if he does it, and if everyone wants, they just ignore the Survivor and go through their merry way and finish it quickly, so in the end the ones that lose are the killer and the unlucky survivor that had to deal with that camper.

There is currently no way to prevent this, so this aspect is very unbalanced and takes quite a lot of the fun factor away.

This is mostly an issue in low rank though, since most decent killers actually roam and hunt to earn points.

Aside from that there are a couple of game breaking features, if the killer ragequits, you don't earn points for surviving, instead you are evaluated with the points you farmed before he quit, which mostly results in a loss for you, which is very irritating.
A lot of killers abuse of this for trolling, they let you farm for a while and all of a sudden they quit.

There are a lot of other gameplay issues and balance issues, but I won't go deep into that than what I said above already, if you want to know more just visit the subreddit for this game, there is quite a list for that and you can also learn a lot there.

So until they actually fix those balance issues with campers and leavers, I will stil consider this game to be "Not Recommended".




OLD REVIEW: 29.06.16
This game is one of those games where it's the most fun with friends, but guess what?
You can't create a party with one or two friends and queue for a game.

Basically you have to select the same Download Region in Steam and then queue at the same time trying to get together for a match with can take forever.

I wrote this review while having 2.8h logged, 2 of those hours were trying to get into the same lobby.

Don't buy this unless you're playing solo.

In a nut shell...

Survivors have to wait ages due to lack of killers playing

Survivors will constantly troll the killer (like me a rank 20 and only played a few hours) to get more points even after all generators are done. They will spend 10 minutes destroying all the hooks and just loitering around the entrance running back and forth rather than ending the game. 

Devs keep nerfing killers like in the latest patch especially

Killers stop playing killers due to the above... this means less killers

Survivors complain about Qs but still do the above to discourage killers and annoy them.

Update: So i been playing for 2 weeks, about 15 hours and felt my first bit of toxicity from survivors... so they won, i had 2 DCs which happened after i hooked them (maybe salty, who knows) the last 2 then spammed the end game chat with "EZ" and called me the lamest trapper ever.... 

i have never understood this kind of gloating, they won, it was easy for them, i am clearly new with only 1 perk... i guess low self worth makes them feel better when they abuse random people. 

On a more happy note, i have encountered a few nice folks after matches, most people dont bother but one match where it was a 2 kill, 2 escape, the last 2 guys said they had fun, i said i had fun and we all danced about with balloons, was nice :)

Dead By Daylight

Für mich ist Dead By Daylight sehr empfehlenswert, es gibt viele updates mit DLCs und ich finde das sehr gut diese DLCs geben Überlebenden und Killern neue Charaktere die das Spiel grusseliger/interessanter machen.

Es gibt viele DLCs sie kosten Geld aber sind fürs Spielerlebnis sehr empfehlenswert und neuestens wurde der "Shop" hinzugefügt wo man mit Blutsteinen die man sich erspielen kann oder mit Aurazellen Kleidungsstücke kaufen kann das gleiche mit Lehrbare Perks.

Es gibt Events wie das "Mondjahr" mit dem man spezielle Münzen bekommen kann und damit als weitere In-Game Shop Währung Kosmetik kaufen kann, heißt das man sich nicht unbedingt Aurazellen kaufen müsste.

Ich hoffe mein Review hat euch weiter geholfen.
~CrazyuberBen

When i first bought the game i thought it was great. Great fun, stress filled but fun stress. Then the developers have created and released a handful of DLC that most players have paid for. With each DLC came a whole load of bugs, glitches and major problems. Matchmaking is a joke, killer bugs allowing multi killers to combine into 1 super killer. Killers always being the host, rather than having a dedicated server. Along with ridiculous unbalanced gameplay, the game is pretty much a joke now. Developers do nothing to resolve the major issues but still put all their efforts into creating more content. A vast majority of the community would rather see fixes before more content now and this needs to happen ASAP.

I do love this game, i don't think it was a bad inversion, BUT, i do think it has some IMPORTANT problems, starting with the "lobby simulator" feature when trying to play with friends, and ending with the PAINFULL cheater detected bugg, the lobby simulator is a problem which can be taken at least, but the cheater detected bugg is soo much, i'm having to reinstall the hole game to see if it is possible that it unbugs, i haven't used cheats, neither i would, even less in this game, as... why should i use them¿? it'd have no sense, this is not a game where you'd earn anything with cheating (i don't mean that you can earn anything in any by cheats, i just mean in my opinion at least for this game they have 0 logic as... you have no ressources, no lifebar... so, what do you hack¿? beign imortal, welp, congratulations, you make youself the game boring for you xD) well, returning to what i was explaining, eventhough i'd never cheat on this game (or in any game in multiplayer (i must admit i had cheated for fun in other games like TBOI to see things, to test sinergies and that kind of things) but in multiplayer games it makes the game unfair, so i wouldn't use them never) but, eventhoug, the game always kick me from every lobby with the "cheater detected" signal, and it is extremelly uncomfortable, i think that if they want their game to stay alive, they should fix it the sooner they can, because, i'm not the only one with that problem, and the game is starting to die, so, if you don't want the game to be the one who is dead by daylight you would do better solving those buggs develovers.

I'm changing my recomendation to a thumbs up. Like I stated on my previous review, the dev's have been listening to the community and the current patch has balanced the game alot more and in my opinion, it is now fun to play as both a killer and a survivor. The new killer "Mike Myers" is in my opinion, a masterful killer. DBD got him right and when I face him as a survivor, I want to pee my pants. Playing as him has wonderful moments. What I like best about him is that depending on the addons you choose, you play completely differently. None of the other killers have that and I hope we get more killers that can have multiple playstyles to them. 

If you like to be scared, or you like killing hapless survivors, this is the game for you. 

--------------- Old Review -------------------------------------------

So, I've got alot of hours in this game. That is because I love it... well... "loved" would be more accurate. When this game first came out, the Dev's did a great job of listening to the community and making improvements to the game... and to a small extent, the still listen, just not to everyone. Survivors and Killers have drastically different views of where this game should go, which is understandable, but the problem is that instead of trying to find a middle ground, the developers seem to favor the Survivors. 

There is litte debate that Survivors get alot more love then Killers from the developers. Being primarily a killer, it saddens me every time Survivors get something they want and Killers get something taken away. Most recently killers were promissed more cosmetic outfits for free when they released the 80's suitcase for survivors. All they did though, was give 1 new cosmetic weapon to the killers... woopie, each survivor has 3 complete outfits (not including the paid 80's suitcase), I really feel killers are getting loved to... 

Recently, updates have been made to matchmaking right before the weekend that have been so bad that most players can't even get into a match. A fast way to kill a game is to make it unplayable during peek hours. You would think after two failed updates before the weekend, the would wait, but no, another weekend update and the game is broken again. Oh and news flash, they don't work on the weekends so the shit isn't fixed till they are back in the office the following week. 

If / When Behavior decides to listen to both sides of the community and try to meet a middle ground instead of just favoring one side or the other, I'll change my recommendation to a yes, but for now, I'm finding another game to play.
